data.description: extends Mail::Box with the speed of C
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Implementation of MIME message parser as optional module for
    Mail::Box. It is written in C for performance reasons only.

    The interface is compatible with Mail::Box::Parser::Perl, which is
    part of my Mail::Box module. Other parsers may be added later.
